page.title: 10Life at the Bury farm,Stev.
page.content: Mr.and Mrs. Warner-Smith have lived at the{Old Bury}for 27 years,but the farm has been in the family for many years.Mrs.Warner-Smith likes living in this very{old house,}she said the nic- est thing was the atmosphere,and the {graveyard}behind doesn't worry them at all.She has to do things a normal wife wouldn't do,like looking after cattle,helping with the{harvesting and from{March to June}feeding the pheasants in the evening. They have three{workers}living and helping on their 130 acres;but also rent some grazing land for their beef cattle.On their land they grow{wheat, {oats,barley,beans and potatoes.}They enjoy the open-air life,although they hate working outside when it's cold. Mr.Warner-Smith said the funniest thing he has seen on the farm was a cow pulling a man along by a rope!
